page.title: 11LAW AND ORDER:PEBMARSH AREA
page.content: Pebmarsh does not have its own{ {policeman}or{police station.} Instead,it has a{Community Policeman} who lives in{Bures.}His name is{ {P.C.Lees.}He covers the villages of Bures,Lamarsh,Alphamstone,Twinstead,Gr eat and Little Henny,Middleton,Wickham St.Paul and Pebmarsh. Most of the criminal activities dealt with by P.C.Lees are{theft,traffic {offences}and{criminal damage. In September 1982,Mr.Chamley's barn was burnt down by an{arsonist}from Halstead. In May 1985,{thieves}stole a brass bed from the cottage next to the school.The thieves were caught in June 1985. P.C.Lees comes to our School to warn children of{the dangers of talking to {strangers,}to talk about{Road Safety } and to give {cycling tests.
